name: WSRNodeJS
description: This is the Server Side of the framework [S.A.R.A.H.](http://encausse.net/s-a-r-a-h), an Home Automation project built  on top of: * C# (Kinect) client for Voice, Gesture, Face, QRCode recognition.  * NodeJS (ExpressJS) server for Internet of Things communication
